sentences.en: Inspection distance between draught marks and keel plate after marking out.
sentences.cn: 划线后检查吃水标尺至平板龙骨之间的距离.

sentences.en: Jason had helped him out with a series of loans, until he could get back on an even keel.
sentences.cn: 贾森接连借了几笔钱给他，在他重新走上正轨之前帮他渡过了难关。

sentences.en: Later, the beak, claws and keel become very soft and pliable.
sentences.cn: 此后, 喙 、 爪和胸骨变得很软和易弯曲.

sentences.en: She does almost everything on an even keel.
sentences.cn: 她做起事来几乎都是四平八稳的.

sentences.en: The keel hit the rock first.
The keel of her sister ship will be laid by the time she discharges at Calcutta.
sentences.cn: 等它在加尔各答卸货的时候,它的姊妹船的龙骨就会铺好啦.

sentences.en: The keel of the boat was made of steel.
The keel of the ship has been laid.
The part of a ship at which the prow joins the keel.
sentences.cn: '前'.''踵艏''. '柱'.''脚船的一部分,船首与船骨相接于此.

sentences.en: The sides of a ship flare from the keel to the deck.
sentences.cn: 船壳由龙骨向外弯曲至甲板处.

sentences.en: The strong wind made the sailboat keel over and the passengers fell into the water.
sentences.cn: 强风刮翻了船,乘客掉入水中.

sentences.en: The workers are laying down a keel.
Things are now on more of a even keel weightwise.
sentences.cn: 从重量分布来说,行车更趋平稳.

sentences.en: Why, he'd keel over just with two draws.
sentences.cn: 嘿, 让他抽上一两口他就会一头昏倒.

sentences.en: You know, to keep things on an even keel, right?
sentences.cn: 你知道要让事情平稳发展对吧?

sentences.en: You sense the stresses in the hull each time the keel meets the ground.
sentences.cn: 每次龙骨触地的时候你都能感受到船体所受的压力。

words.tran_cn: [脊椎][植][船]龙骨；平底船；龙骨脊

trans.tran_en: a bar along the bottom of a boat that keeps it steady in the water
